title.native: 転生したらスライムだった件 転スラ日記
title.romaji: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken: Tensura Nikki

description:
“Dear diary… I got reincarnated as a slime.”

Even in another world, lives aren’t always on the line. There’s plenty of work to be done, from feeding the community and forging the items the community needs; as well as plenty of play …and hijinks throughout! Join Rimuru and friends as they kick back and enjoy their daily lives.

(Source: Kodansha USA)
synonyms: The Slime Diaries: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime
เกิดใหม่ทั้งทีก็เป็นสไลม์ไปซะแล้ว : เดอะ สไลม์ ไดอารี่
关于我转生变成史莱姆这档事 转生史莱姆日记
เกิดใหม่ทั้งทีก็เป็นสไลม์ไปซะแล้ว ไดอารี่ของสไลม์

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Reincarnation
tags.description: Features a character being born again after death, typically as another person or in another world.

tags.name: Agriculture
tags.description: Prominently features agriculture practices.

tags.name: Shapeshifting
tags.description: Features character(s) who changes one's appearance or form.

tags.name: Agender
tags.description: Prominently features agender characters.

tags.name: Kingdom Management
tags.description: Characters in these series take on the responsibility of running a town or kingdom, whether they take control of an existing one, or build their own from the ground up.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Goblin
tags.description: A goblin is a monstrous creature from European folklore. They are almost always small and grotesque, mischievous or outright malicious, and greedy. Sometimes with magical abilities.

tags.name: Male Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is male.

tags.name: Monster Girl
tags.description: Prominently features a female character who is part-monster.

tags.name: Dragons
tags.description: Prominently features mythical reptiles which generally have wings and can breathe fire.

tags.name: Ghost
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a ghost.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Monster Boy
tags.description: Prominently features a male character who is a part-monster.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Medieval
tags.description: Partially or completely set in the Middle Ages or a Middle Ages-inspired setting. Commonly features elements such as European castles and knights.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Ninja
tags.description: Prominently features Japanese warriors traditionally trained in espionage, sabotage and assasination.

tags.name: Found Family
tags.description: Features a group of characters with no biological relations that are united in a group providing social support.

tags.name: Cute Boys Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around male characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

node.description:
__[Profile (Verygoo)](http://www.verygoo.jp/artists/ron/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ron_sdf)__

__Ryuuta Iida__, also known by his stage name Ron (stylized as R・O・N) is a Japanese musician, arranger, composer, lyricist, sound producer, guitarist, keyboardist and singer. He was the sound producer and guitarist of Japanese rock band [OLDCODEX](https://anilist.co/staff/112151/OLDCODEX) along with seiyuu [Tatsuhisa Suzuki](https://anilist.co/staff/95735) from 2009-2012.

He currently works under the artist management company Verygoo, has a solo vocal project called [Stereo Dive Foundation](https://anilist.co/staff/118710/Stereo-Dive-Foundation), is a member of the rock band [ROSARYHILL](http://rosaryhill.net/) (2008-) as a keyboardist and vocalist, and works as a music creator for the creative music unit [(K)NoW_NAME](https://anilist.co/staff/126602/KNoW-NAME).

[Website](https://kumaka.jp/) | [Profile (Apollo Bay)](https://apollobay.jp/talent/熊田茜音/) | [Profile (Amuse)](https://artist.amuse.co.jp/artist/kumada_akane/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/official_kumaka) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/kumadakane_official/)

Akane Kumada is a Japanese voice actress and singer. She is affiliated with Apollo Bay and made her voice acting debut in 2018.

__[Profile (Verygoo)](http://www.verygoo.jp/artists/ron/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ron_sdf)__

__Ryuuta Iida__, also known by his stage name Ron (stylized as R・O・N) is a Japanese musician, arranger, composer, lyricist, sound producer, guitarist, keyboardist and singer. He was the sound producer and guitarist of Japanese rock band [OLDCODEX](https://anilist.co/staff/112151/OLDCODEX) along with seiyuu [Tatsuhisa Suzuki](https://anilist.co/staff/95735) from 2009-2012.

He currently works under the artist management company Verygoo, has a solo vocal project called [Stereo Dive Foundation](https://anilist.co/staff/118710/Stereo-Dive-Foundation), is a member of the rock band [ROSARYHILL](http://rosaryhill.net/) (2008-) as a keyboardist and vocalist, and works as a music creator for the creative music unit [(K)NoW_NAME](https://anilist.co/staff/126602/KNoW-NAME).

__[Profile (Verygoo)](http://www.verygoo.jp/artists/ron/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ron_sdf)__

__Ryuuta Iida__, also known by his stage name Ron (stylized as R・O・N) is a Japanese musician, arranger, composer, lyricist, sound producer, guitarist, keyboardist and singer. He was the sound producer and guitarist of Japanese rock band [OLDCODEX](https://anilist.co/staff/112151/OLDCODEX) along with seiyuu [Tatsuhisa Suzuki](https://anilist.co/staff/95735) from 2009-2012.

He currently works under the artist management company Verygoo, has a solo vocal project called [Stereo Dive Foundation](https://anilist.co/staff/118710/Stereo-Dive-Foundation), is a member of the rock band [ROSARYHILL](http://rosaryhill.net/) (2008-) as a keyboardist and vocalist, and works as a music creator for the creative music unit [(K)NoW_NAME](https://anilist.co/staff/126602/KNoW-NAME).

__Height:__167 cm  
__Hobbies:__ Billiards, drawing, remaking clothes, singing  
__Skills & Abilities:__ Waking up early    

[Profile (Lantis)](https://www.lantis.jp/artist/terashimatakuma/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Terashima_dayo) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC2XXSJBvNygj81VPOJmCu-g)

His debut album "New Game" came out on June 6, 2012. Announced marriage with voice actress [Satomi Satou](https://anilist.co/staff/101560/Satomi-Satou) on July 6, 2017.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/明田川仁)

Affiliated with Magic Capsule, a recording studio led by his father [Susumu Aketagawa](https://anilist.co/staff/120062).

Freelancer. Recognizable for his bassy and often reverbed sound effects.

Regularly works with [Yoshikazu Iwanami](https://anilist.co/staff/101016/) and [Jin Aketagawa](https://anilist.co/staff/103074/).

__Agency:__ I'm Enterprise

[Profile](https://www.imenterprise.jp/profile.php?id=30) | [Official Website](https://www.okasakimiho.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/okasakimiho_PR) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/okasakimiho) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Miho_Okasaki) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/岡咲美保)

**Non-anime roles:**
• Hator - Memento Mori (VG)
• Anis - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
• Barcarola - Reverse: 1999 (VG)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/kobayasidesuyo)

A Japanese voice actor and actor. In 2007, he joined the Yen Theater Research Institute before he was promoted to a Drama Group Yen Membership. He is best known for voicing [Saichi Sugimoto](https://anilist.co/character/124704/) in [Golden Kamuy](https://anilist.co/anime/99699/) and [Legoshi](https://anilist.co/character/125168/) in [Beastars](https://anilist.co/anime/107660/).

__Non-anime roles:__
- Von Lycaon - Zenless Zone Zero (VG)
- Male V  - Cyberpunk 2077
